Message:
If you want to survive,
you have no choice
but to get strong.

That’s why I joined the
Young Knights of Longinus.

At first they mocked me,
saying witches would be
terrible knights.

But, all the crazy training
brought us closer together.

If I’m here,
I’ll be able to survive.
But, the relief didn’t last long.

We fought an enemy nation’s
squadron and were wiped out...

At this rate, I’m definitely
gonna get executed.

As I slumped in my cell,
there was a sudden burst
of noise outside.

I looked through the peephole,
and saw bandits attacking
the military.
